definitions.definition: A customary way of speaking or acting ; a fashion , a manner , a practice ( often used formerly in such phrases as "at his own guise"; that is, in his own fashion, to suit himself .)
An external appearance in manner or dress ; an appropriate indication or expression ; a garb ; a shape .
A misleading appearance ; a cover , a cloak .

main_definition: A customary way of speaking or acting ; a fashion , a manner , a practice ( often used formerly in such phrases as "at his own guise"; that is, in his own fashion, to suit himself .)
secondary_definitions: An external appearance in manner or dress ; an appropriate indication or expression ; a garb ; a shape .
A misleading appearance ; a cover , a cloak .

main_definition: ( Internet slang ) Deliberate misspelling of guys .
